$comment: this is json schema for config file of asm tools for the VSCode extension xsro.masm-tasm to use

dosbox.description:
The commands to use when in dosbox mode.
The extension will mount this folder to dosbox's disk C, the file's folder to disk D
and a seperate space as dosbox's disk X,the extension will read file asm.log to process assembler's message

masm.description: The commands to exec for assembling and linking in dosbox when using masm

tasm.description: The commands to exec for assembling and linking in dosbox when using tasm

tasm_debug.description: The commands to exec for debuging in dosbox when using tasm

masm_debug.description: The commands to exec for debuging in dosbox when using masm

run.description: The command to run the generated file

after_action.description:
The commands to exec after run or debug
 when set `masmtasm.dosbox.run` as `choose`

msdos.description: the commands to use when in msdos player or auto mode

workspace.description: The workspace when using seperate space

path.description: The path needed to add to the environment value `PATH`

tasm.description: The commands to exec for assembling and linking in cmd when using tasm
